name: Manchu Wok
address: University Community Centre, 1151 Richmond Street, London

menu_items.name: Vegetable Spring Rolls
menu_items.description: Crispy rolls filled with cabbage, carrots, and glass noodles, served with sweet chili sauce.

menu_items.name: Chicken Dumplings
menu_items.description: Steamed dumplings filled with minced chicken and scallions, served with soy sauce.

menu_items.name: Tofu Stir Fry
menu_items.description: Stir-fried tofu with bell peppers, broccoli, and soy sauce, served with jasmine rice.

menu_items.name: Beef and Broccoli
menu_items.description: Tender beef slices stir-fried with broccoli in a savory oyster sauce, served with steamed rice.

menu_items.name: Sweet and Sour Chicken
menu_items.description: Crispy chicken pieces tossed in a tangy sweet and sour sauce, served with fried rice.

menu_items.name: Mango Sticky Rice
menu_items.description: Sweet sticky rice topped with fresh mango slices and coconut milk.

menu_items.name: Almond Cookies
menu_items.description: Traditional Chinese almond cookies made with almond flour and butter.

menu_items.name: Green Tea
menu_items.description: Refreshing hot green tea brewed from premium leaves.

menu_items.name: Lychee Soda
menu_items.description: Sparkling soda with a hint of lychee flavor, served over ice.

menu_items.name: Vegetarian Fried Rice
menu_items.description: Fried rice with mixed vegetables, eggs, and soy sauce.

menu_items.name: Noodle Bar Wednesday
menu_items.description: A selection of noodles and toppings available every Wednesday.

menu_items.name: Build-A-Bowl Thursday
menu_items.description: Create your own bowl with a variety of ingredients every Thursday.

menu_items.name: Fish & Chip Friday
menu_items.description: Traditional fish and chips served every Friday.

menu_items.name: Buffet
menu_items.description: Buffet featuring local and seasonal cuisine, includes daily beverage and dessert features.
